Another day another question!

Hello everyone and thank you for establishing such a great community. 

I was not sure either this question should be on "Modded" board or not, but I believe it is not because it is a property of the stock game. I recently downloaded "de IVA Extension" and I loved it. The thing is, looking at different directions requires holding right click or toggling it, which makes cursor invisible. Is there a way to make it STILL visible while in "looking around" mode (I don't know what it is called ). 

Answers are much appreciated. Happy explorations.
I have moved this to the Modded Support subforum. Welcome aboard, and do stick around!
